name: I Hate it When My Son Steals My Phone
name_original: I Hate it When My Son Steals My Phone
description:
"Single mother, working all day, and I can't seem to find a break while on business calls. This will just all fall over me as I receive a deadly serious call that will certify my future in the company and how I'll receive money going  on into the future. All those days of not being able to pay attention to my kid will finally pay off..."

And as you look down to receive the call on your phone, um... it's gone? And guess who has it? The kid, who else. Peace was never an option.

Chase and try to catch that little trouble maker as he runs from you going around your house with YOUR PHONE. Grab things he hates like vegetables and books to force him to stop in his tracks, but avoid giving him things like comics so that he doesn't get an edge on you. The above score will let you know how well (or bad) you are doing: reaching a score of ten catches the kid, but go below zero and you'll let him get away.
